6 inline double interpolatormb(double t, double td)
7 {
8  double coefficients[6];
9  double interpolation = 0.0;
10  coefficients[0] = 0.0;//0.00000309;
11  coefficients[1] = 0.00519100;
12  coefficients[2] = -0.5098000;
13  coefficients[3] = 11.9900000;
14  coefficients[4] = -17.470000;
15  coefficients[5] = 6.98900000;
16 
17  if (t <= 0.0 )
18  {
19  return 0.0;
20  }
21 
22  if (t >= td)
23  {
24  return 1.0;
25  }
26 
27  interpolation = coefficients[5] * std::pow(t/td,5) +
28  coefficients[4] * std::pow(t/td,4) +
29  coefficients[3] * std::pow(t/td,3) +
30  coefficients[2] * std::pow(t/td,2) +
31  coefficients[1] * t +
32  coefficients[0];
33 
34  if (interpolation > 1)
35  return 1.0;
36  if (interpolation < 0)
37  return 0.0;
38 
39  return interpolation;
40 }

43 inline double interpolatormb_line(double t, double td)
44 {

46  {
47  return 0.0;
48  }
49 
50  if (t >= td)
51  {
52  return 1.0;
53  }
54 
55  return t/td;
56 }

61 {
62  double coefficients[6];

64  coefficients[0] = 0.0;
65  coefficients[1] = 0.0;

72  {
73  return 0.0;
